site.title: ImpactMojo 101 Knowledge Series - Development Education for South Asia
site.description: Curated library of full-length knowledge decks exploring justice, equity, and development practice in India and South Asia.
site.keywords: development education, South Asia, India, social justice, data feminism, development economics, public policy
site.author: Dr. Varna Sri Raman

hero.title: ImpactMojo 101 Knowledge Series
hero.description: ImpactMojo is a curated library of full-length knowledge decks that explore justice, equity, and development practice in India and South Asia. Each one is grounded in theory, applied in context, and ready for real-world use by educators, practitioners, and social researchers.

learning_paths.title: Recommended Learning Paths
learning_paths.subtitle: Structured pathways to build expertise in key areas

paths.title: Data Analysis Track
paths.description: Master data skills from basics to advanced analysis

paths.title: Gender Studies Pathway
paths.description: Comprehensive understanding of gender in development. Covers foundational concepts, intersectionality, care economy, and women's economic empowerment.

paths.title: Research Methods Journey
paths.description: Complete research toolkit for development work. From ethics to qualitative methods, econometrics, and impact evaluation frameworks.

paths.title: Health Systems Track
paths.description: Public health and health system strengthening. Covers foundational concepts, mental health, nutrition, and sexual & reproductive health rights.

courses_section.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive collection of development-focused knowledge decks
courses_section.total_count_text: Explore our complete library of {count} knowledge decks

labs_section.title: ImpactMojo Labs
labs_section.subtitle: Interactive tools and experimental features for development practitioners

sections.title: ImpactMojo
content: Advancing justice through evidence-based learning in South Asian development practice.

about.title: About Dr. Varna Sri Raman
about.subtitle: Development Economist & Educator
description: Dr. Varna Sri Raman is a development economist with a PhD focused on creating accessible, evidence-based educational resources for South Asia. Her work bridges the gap between academic research and practical application in development work.
She specializes in data analysis, gender studies, and development economics, with particular expertise in making complex concepts accessible to practitioners working across India and South Asia.
